Reviews.Content: stayed hotel october 2011 friend location bad close city center swimming pool roof hotel guess nice summer period nice clean staff friendly helpfull liked breakfast hotel eggs bacon fruits yogurt etc lots cafes shops nearby

Reviews.Title: “Got what I paid for and more”

Reviews.Content: worried reviews read leaving nice surprise lobby tired ok didnt barcelona sit hotels lobby clean staff friendly helpfull breakfast metro stop hospital clinic near easy

Reviews.Title: “Very good value!”
Reviews.Author: Nat8980
Reviews.Content: bit worried reading bad reviews experience wasnt expensive complain value clean tv ac towels changed day nice staff breakfast location hotel situated 45 minutes metro station hospital clinic sagrada familia beautiful building seen lots shops cafe hotel friends time

Reviews.Title: “Barcelona experience”
Reviews.Author: LakePanorama
Reviews.Content: booked star barcelona researching various websites expensive affordable finding hotel booked booked parking vehicle told moved block threestar issue parking 15 euros day spent 10 minutes maneuvering car hotels underground garage hindsight car hopon busses run morning til night daily rate hotel clean booked due hotel wireless internet extra charge unfortunately internet entire hotel evening credit fixed late evening notified phone repair hotel nice allow adjustment lack internet finally breakfast 10 euros pretty bad price selection eggs bacon fruit yogurt etc hotel reasonably priced offered breakfast clean friendly staff consider staying barcelona

Reviews.Title: “wish i hadn't booked this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Vishj
Reviews.Content: starting vacation hotel management eerie feeling charged amount stay credit card 7 days arrival mentioned booking site pay hotel hotel touristic hotel command 3star tag rents expensive worth customer service view infact backyard window hotel bang edge busy junction breakfast ok swimming pool terrace baby pool

Reviews.Title: “Convenient budget hotel, breakfast excellent!”
Reviews.Author: olegkravitz
Reviews.Content: looking cheap hotel near barcelona sants railway station decided live aston walking distance train station 12 minutes brisk pace left morning hotel location barcelona sants hotel bad tv channels window air conditioning aston tasty breakfast buffet selection dishes front desk clock night key close hotel metro hospital clinic

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff, great breakfast”
Reviews.Author: ryancropp
Reviews.Content: hotel bit value stayed nights beds comfortable clean average moderately sized happy service staff hotel friendly helpful breakfast fantastic lots healthy options issues free wifi floor lobby

Reviews.Title: “Everything is fine except morning coffee”
Reviews.Author: Mindaugas_Danys
Reviews.Content: hotel adequate price maybe expected staff helpful especially visit barcelona breakfast lots choice dont provide drinkable coffee black tea camomile morning bringing coffee breakfast adjacent cafeteria location block blue metro line pillows somewhat thin hard

Reviews.Title: “Quality for value”

Reviews.Content: mba students ukraine seminar barcelona sunotel barcelona week classes held hotel organization perfect value money plus convenient location metro clinic 5 min walk suggestion recommend breakfast option eat

Reviews.Title: “Awful, don't bother. Checked in, checked straight back out!!”

Reviews.Content: booked hotel strength reviews bookingcom hotel booked hotel emergency stranded barcelona due ash cloud found hotel walked reception started sweating hot receptionist polite efficient due circumstances beg hotter reception uncomfortable bed bathroom limescale mould removing air conditoning unit wouldnt actually chill air circulate window 5 inches woulnt stay bad due traffic noise below plus hotel rooftop terrace pool dont believe pictures jacuzzi wasnt stay spent 30 mins internet cafe found alternative hotel barcelona universal actually cheaper knocked spots charge reviews beyond understanding spent total 2 hours hotel 1hour 50 minutes thinking heartily recommend twice
